price: 3. Annaga ayaa kaaga qisoon qisooyinka midda u wanaagsan, ee aanu kuugu waxyoonno Qur'aankan, inkastoo ka hor, aad ka mid aheyd kuwaan u war heyn.
arabic: نَحۡنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ أَحۡسَنَ ٱلۡقَصَصِ بِمَآ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ وَإِن كُنتَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَمِنَ ٱلۡغَٰفِلِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: naḥnu naquṣṣu ʿalayka aḥsana al-qaṣaṣi bimā awḥaynā ilayka hādhā al-qur'āna wa-in kunta min qablihi lamina al-ghāfilīna
